entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:14 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:07 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
